mapper.select: SELECT rcrbrd_num, mem_id, rcrbrd_subject, rcrbrd_content, rcrbrd_pw, rcrbrd_views, rcrbrd_date, rcrbrd_edate, rcrbrd_ip, gm_code, rcrbrd_status, rcrbrd_adr, rcrbrd_max FROM tb_rcrboard ORDER BY rcrbrd_num
select gm.gm_name from tb_game as gm join tb_rcrboard as rb on rb.gm_code = gm.gm_code
SELECT gm.gm_code, gm.gm_name, gm.gm_price, gm.gm_level, gm.gm_category, gm.gm_img FROM tb_rcrboard as rb join tb_game as gm on rb.gm_code = gm.gm_code WHERE rcrbrd_num = #{rcrbrd_num}

SELECT rb.mem_id, mm.mem_pw, mm.mem_nick, mm.mem_name, mm.mem_zip, mm.mem_adr1, mm.mem_adr2, mm.mem_phone, mm.mem_birth, mm.mem_grade, mm.upoint, mm.apoint, mm.mem_receive, mm.good, mm.buyer_bad from tb_mem as mm join tb_rcrboard as rb on rb.mem_id = mm.mem_id WHERE rb.rcrbrd_num = #{rcrbrd_num}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_rcrboard group by mem_id having mem_id = (select mem_id from tb_rcrboard where rcrbrd_num = #{rcrbrd_num})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_rcrboard (mem_id, rcrbrd_subject, rcrbrd_content, rcrbrd_pw, rcrbrd_views, rcrbrd_date, rcrbrd_edate, rcrbrd_ip, gm_code, rcrbrd_status, rcrbrd_adr, rcrbrd_max) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{rcrbrd_subject}, #{rcrbrd_content}, #{rcrbrd_pw}, #{rcrbrd_views}, now(), #{rcrbrd_edate}, #{rcrbrd_ip}, #{gm_code}, '진행중', #{rcrbrd_adr}, #{rcrbrd_max})
